title: Tassel, 18th century
medium: Medium: silk, metal thread, copper discs, wooden core
description: Skirt of red silk threads with four ornamental strings. Head is turned in a vase shapes, painted gold and partly covered by gilt braid in woven design. Loop of woven braid in silk and metal threads.

tombstone.epitaph: Tassel, 18th century. Medium: silk, metal thread, copper discs, wooden core. 1908-2-5.
